Original_Text: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Apple Inc. unveiled a new AI-powered photo editing tool for its latest iPhone, aiming to compete with Google's imaging software, the company announced Monday.
NEW YORK (AP) - Retail giant Walmart reported a 5% increase in quarterly profits, driven by strong online sales, but cautioned about rising supply chain costs, analysts said Tuesday.
LONDON (Reuters) - A new species of fish was discovered in the Pacific Ocean, offering insights into deep-sea ecosystems, marine biologists reported Wednesday.
CHICAGO (Sports Network) - The Chicago Bulls defeated the Miami Heat 102-95, with DeMar DeRozan scoring 30 points, the team announced Thursday.
TOKYO (Reuters) - Sony launched a new gaming console with enhanced VR capabilities, targeting holiday shoppers, the company revealed Friday.
BOSTON (AP) - Biotech firm Moderna secured a $1.2 billion deal to develop a new vaccine platform, boosting its stock by 8%, analysts reported Monday.
PARIS (AFP) - The European Space Agency's latest satellite successfully mapped atmospheric changes, aiding climate research, scientists confirmed Tuesday.
HONG KONG (Dow Jones) - HSBC announced a $3 billion share buyback program after strong quarterly earnings, boosting its stock price, the bank said Wednesday.
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Researchers developed a new solar panel with 30% higher efficiency, potentially lowering energy costs, the university announced Thursday.
GENEVA (Reuters) - The WHO launched a global initiative to improve access to mental health services, targeting underserved regions, officials said Friday.
